product_name: Gerber Winchester Knife and Flashlight - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Add two of the 10 essentials to your gear supply with the Gerber Winchester Knife and Flashlight. Knife has a stainless-steel, fine-edge blade that stays sharp; blade locks open for secure handling when cutting. Checked-patterned stainless-steel handle offers good grip; attach a lanyard (not included) to the hole in the handle. Knife includes a pocket clip for easy carrying. Task Light LED flashlight outputs 5 lumens and throws a beam up to 9m. Anodized aluminum construction stands up to use in the outdoors. Rear on/off switch is easy to operate; runs on two AA batteries (included). Overstock.
short_description: Add two of the 10 essentials to your gear supply with the Gerber Winchester Knife and Flashlight.
